General.Name: Jiangsu Transimage Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Transimage Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells various input equipment in China and Internationally. The company offers notebook/desktop keyboards, tablet external keyboards, touch modules, and mice which are used in downstream computer products, such as desktop, notebook, and tablet computers. It also provides flexible circuit boards, including communication, consumer electronics, and computer boards which are mainly used in wearable devices, automotive electronics, notebook computers and mobile phones/tablets, and other product fields. In addition, the company produces and sells computer and mobile phone accessories; computer peripheral products, such as keyboards and mice and their parts, and injection molded parts and related molds. Further, the company researches, designs, produces, and sells UV transfer printing decorative parts, buttons, texture explosion-proof film series products; mobile phone backplanes, panels, middle frames, and structural parts of smart devices; raw materials such as cathode materials, anode materials, and electrolytes for sodium-ion and lithium ion batteries; battery packs, battery management systems and components, and lithium-ion and sodium-ion battery energy storage systems. Additionally, it offers computer application software development; import and export trade services; sells packaging materials, plastic, special chemical products, synthetic and membrane materials, and high-performance fibers; and manufactures composite materials. Furthermore, it provides industrial, integrated circuit, graphic, professional design services; planning; communication equipment; engineering and technology research and experimental development; market research; and education consulting services. Jiangsu Transimage Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Gaoyou, China.

4.Name: Ms. Xiao Li  Xu
